storyInfo: A sudden crisis leaves the Doctor and Amiya trapped in the Columbian wastelands. Unexpected aid against unexpected plots, with many possible solutions.

attributes.content: 5:20 P.M. \ Clear
Columbia City, Tkaronto
The name's Dylan, Rhodes Island low-altitude aircraft pilot, and I'm currently running pell-mell around the city.
I should be sitting in the cockpit of my aircraft, joystick in hand. The only things I should be facing down are turbulence and terrain.
Instead, I'm clutching one half of an automatic assault crossbow in my hands, and hell, the first time I heard of this model was earlier this morning. Even just half of it is damned heavy.
My palms are all sweaty. If I have to end up in a warzone, I sure as hell shouldn't be on the ground, let alone in some dark alley in Columbia.
I just hope to God that my enemy isn't... Ugh.
Dylan, I got my hands full over here. Can you help a gal out and tell me what it says?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It says Police. The 'police' of Tkaronto.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: He started it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But it seems... probably not the real deal. A real botch-job if I've ever seen one.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: At least he looked the part, pretty much the same as the guys up on the roof earlier this morning. Better than the ones that didn't have a uniform ready.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So let me ask this question again: what kind of cops wind their automatic assault crossbows during questioning?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Columbian cops?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Very funny. You know he's not a cop, at least not the kind we're used to dealing with.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I lift my eyes to cast a glance at the black-clad man collapsed in the alley, and then lower my gaze again to the half-a-weapon in my hands.
It was pointed straight at my chest just a moment ago, but now it's smashed into two pieces.
This 'policeman' is unconscious. If Blaze remembered the Doctor's instructions when she struck, then he should still be able to cling to life.
The Rhodes Island team arrived in Tkaronto yesterday.
No matter how many times I experience it, this kind of speed always surprises me as a pilot—
Rhodes Island is in the process of steaming to the Grand Knight Territory, and we've crossed over the entire western wastelands by air. The entire western wastelands, I say.

According to the plan, after Amiya and the Doctor finish their business, we'll take the same route back to Rhodes Island. The Grand Knight Territory might not have finished its urban subdivision assembly at this time.
All I know is Rhodes Island was invited to visit during the Kazimierz Major, but I'm in the dark about when and why. But anyway, the sooner we can head back, the better.
If I wasn't in such a hurry, I wouldn't mind taking a few days off to chill in the metropolis... but after this, I'm not in the mood for that anymore.
Are we... safe?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: No, not until we leave Tkaronto— Maybe not even until we leave Columbia.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Check for me if he's still breathing. It'd be nice if you made sure he kept on breathing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I... Um, alright.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: This is my first time seeing such a powerful automatic crossbow. Are these weapons common in Columbia?
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: Automatic weapons like that are a Columbian specialty.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I wonder how the Doctor's doing...
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: As soon as the raid started, the Doctor and Amiya left in a car. No clue if the autopilot system that Closure was fiddling with will work though...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What a disaster... Even those two got caught off guard.
attributes.name: Dylan

attributes.content: They're only human after all... Sometimes shit happens.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: They took over the hotel and seized all the drug samples we kept behind...
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Whatever, we can worry about that later.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We've gotta think of a way to get out of this city safely first.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We've lost everything, but you are still not standing by my side.
Then what has it all been for?
Just to leave the faintest sliver of hope?
But, hope?
Hope?
Don't you know, that hope is a cruel thing indeed?
When you realize it can't be undone, when you realize you are powerless, when you find yourself nothing but desperate...
Hope is enough to drive a perfectly good person mad.

attributes.options: But...

attributes.content: You want to say something, but you can't move your body.
You seem to be drifting in the void, everything before your eyes so familiar and yet so distant. These are a part of your memories, floating alongside you like fragments.
Like this, you continue to drift with your ceaseless thoughts, watching the familiar woman before you gradually fade away.
You open your eyes, and before you stretches an endless rocky desert. You see a strange, ugly iron bucket helm.
A peculiar man seems to be looking your way, but you cannot see his expression through that rough bucket helm.
10:43 A.M. \ Clear
Gaspar Wildland
Good morning, good afternoon, and good evening, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Can you talk?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: You? Who are you? Where am I?

attributes.content: The friend awakens, little rabbit.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You feel someone tightly embrace your waist.
But before experiencing this warm embrace, the cold, hard touch of the rocks behind you and the throbbing pain in your head remind you that all is not well.
I'm so glad! You're awake... I don't know what I would've done if you didn't wake up...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: How are you feeling? Does it hurt anywhere?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I'm fine... Just my head hurts a little.;...Nothing serious.;I'm not that frail.

attributes.content: Your head hurts? Did you hit it? Let me have a look.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you sure you're fine, Doctor? Do you need me to help you up?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... you should still be careful. You're not in the best shape.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Worry not, little rabbit. There is nothing wrong with this 'Doctor,' at least not physically.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: On a spiritual level, however, one cannot say. You were mumbling a great deal in your slumber, but before you complain, I did not listen closely.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Who are you...?

attributes.content: Ah, pardon me for not introducing myself.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: As you can see, I am a merchant.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You can call me Cannot, or Mr. Goodenough should you prefer that instead.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: To be honest, friend, that display you put on earlier was simply too exhilarating. It is not every day one sees someone performing Originium Arts while flying off a cliff. A most excellent show indeed.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Off a cliff? What were we...;There might've been a problem with Closure's autopilot system...

attributes.content: This should be Columbia's... eastern wastelands.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That is correct, little rabbit. This is the Gaspar Wildland, and you two are quite fortunate.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Fortunate?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, yes. Quite fortunate indeed. Two kilometers further south is a poisonous swamp, and had your car gotten stuck in that, good luck getting it out.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: I wonder how the others are doing.;......;Where are the others?

attributes.content: The other operators split off on their own. I'm sure Blaze is taking good care of them...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But we can't get a hold of them, or any other branch offices.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Wait, what about the communicator?;Wait, what about the provisions?

attributes.content: We left it all on the 'Bad Guy.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not just the communicator. We didn't even have time to pack food or water.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sounds like a desperate situation indeed, friends?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But there is always a way, if you don't mind...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Might as well.

attributes.content: I am quite familiar with this area. I can show you to the nearest Messenger Outpost where, should all go well, you will be able to contact your friends.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Who attacked us?

attributes.content: An excellent question indeed, but the only ones who could answer it are no longer able to speak.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The bucket-headed man points to the nearby cliff, where a unique-looking armed vehicle is emitting a thick, black smoke. By the looks of things, it's been wrecked for quite some time now.
Mercenaries. They've been chasing us even after we left the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dedicated to their job. Dedicated to the point of giving up their own lives.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: To be frank, Columbian mercenaries range from peerless to useless, and the ones with the resources to hire such dedicated mercenaries can be counted on one hand.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They seem to have taken quite an interest in you, friends. How exactly did you offend these great moguls?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: So it was them...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, Miss Amiya, are you really unwilling to consider the offer?
attributes.name: Officer-in-Charge

attributes.content: In Columbia, you'll be hard-pressed to find a more suitable partner than Mama John's. We can provide fairly favorable terms for Rhodes Island's drug sales.
attributes.name: Officer-in-Charge

attributes.content: Thank you for your generosity, but...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're only here for technical exchange. Rhodes Island has no plans for any deeper-level commercial cooperation.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And the Oripathy analgesics we brought are still undergoing trials. These are more of a proof of concept than a finished product.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The process of researching and developing Oripathy treatments is long and complicated, and in these areas, we still have many opportunities for cooperation in the future.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Many opportunities for cooperation in the future...? Hahaha...
attributes.name: Officer-in-Charge

attributes.content: They planned this from the very beginning...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Should we contact the police first?

attributes.content: Police? Friend, you don't seem to understand where you are.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mama John's is the largest firm in Tkaronto. The chief of police boasts of his connections to their corporate leadership in order to display his status. I suggest you change your mind.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The fact that they dared to steal your goods in the urban core means that from the very beginning, they never thought anything of you.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It's all my fault... I bought into their talk.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Don't blame yourself. Nobody could've expected them to be like this.;......;No, I'm just as responsible, Amiya. I should've known.

attributes.content: Mr... Good...y?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ah. What is it, Miss Rabbit?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You just said you could take us through the wastelands, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That I did say, Miss Rabbit.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: How do you plan to do that? Were you a Catastrophe Messenger?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That is nothing you need to concern yourself over.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I have plied my trade in the wastelands for many years, and that has given me a knack for avoiding Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course, I do ask for a small guide fee, two refined Originium Ingots in this case. Not too much to ask for in such a situation, yes?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: We only have Columbian Gold Certificates, and won't be able to pay you until we get in touch with our ship. Is that alright?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No problem! My friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Doctor... What do you think? We could also figure a way back into the city, to meet up with Blaze and the others.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It's too dangerous. Looks like we don't have a choice.;This gentleman seems to have made the choice for us, right?

attributes.content: That is scarcely the case. We always have many choices at any point in our lives, but of course, we tend to pick the best one from the available options.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: I hope we can have... a fruitful relationship in the coming days?

attributes.content: Of course, my friend!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I trust that this will be a most enjoyable journey.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Five hours later...
...As I said, bandits are not the biggest threat in the wastelands. I once knew the most courageous local– he even...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Doctor, give me your hand.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Phew, we're up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: How many hills have we crossed?

attributes.content: This is only the second one, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Let me rest... Let me rest...;(Stay silent, gasping for breath);I really... let myself go...

attributes.content: Haha, Doctor, sit down here for a minute.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Friend, at your speed, we will be on the road for at least another whole day.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The Doctor might not be able to maintain such a brisk pace.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can slow down a touch, but...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Why can't we go a bit slower?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even as a merchant of the wastelands, there is a limit to the amount of food and water I can carry on me.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: If we slow down too much, we will inevitably run into a supply shortage.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: If that's the case... Mr. Cannot?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Is there a forest nearby? I've heard of an oasis in the wastes of eastern Columbia.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There is, but what use is it?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Night, above the wastelands, in a dark mountain pass.
A tongue of flame consumes dry branches, and the sound of a wooden spoon tapping against a bowl echoes across the canyon along with Amiya's humming.
These vegetables, as well as the mushrooms here, are pretty much all edible as long as they're cooked through.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This kind... is slightly toxic, but can still be eaten in an emergency.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I should've given you more credit, Miss Rabbit.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: To be honest, most friends from the nomadic cities... have no sense of how to survive in the wilds. Many I know will never once step foot in the wastelands.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I see that you have a decent survivalist's skillset. Where are you from? Rim Billiton?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I would not be surprised if you were in fact from Rim Billiton...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Actually, the Doctor taught me all of this, a few years ago...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Huh? I did?

attributes.content: Yes. Back then...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor... Are these edible?
attributes.name: Young Amiya

attributes.content: These vegetables, as well as the mushrooms here, are pretty much all edible as long as they're cooked through.
attributes.name: Doctor

attributes.content: Those were trying times, harrowing times. But they were also good times.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It seems that something is stirring in the back of your mind, but it gradually blurs out.
You try to recall that scene again, but the vague memory is like bubbles that occasionally rise to the water's surface, only to disappear just as quickly.
Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I... Is this something that happened before then?

attributes.content: Ah, it's nothing. It did happen a few years ago, but it doesn't matter if you can't remember.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She lowers her head and continues to stir the bowl, but the smile on her face seems somewhat lonelier.
Ahem, I must also say, you've chosen a most prudent location to make camp. Even though we've made a fire, our position is not easy to detect.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Are there any bandits around here?;......;Who's looking for us?

attributes.content: Bandits, bounty hunters, and countless Rusthammers. There are no shortage of annoyances in this land.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Rusthammer... I've heard the name before. They're a group of vicious marauders, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That description would not be a very rigorous one.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Rusthammer is a loose organization, and it is made up of various smaller groups.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: For example, there is 'Fiends Gang' made up of Sarkaz, and also a group of strange folks who worship Catastrophes as gods. I think they're called 'Followers of the Archosauria', or something.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They worship Catastrophes?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Followers of the Archosauria? What a crazy bunch.;......;Sarkaz? Fiends Gang?

attributes.content: I heard something about a Rusthammer gang in Sargon that called themselves 'Archosauria Devils.' They seemed to have been searching for an 'Archosauria war-god with massive horns on its head.'
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: An operator from Columbia once told me that Rusthammer used to be just a few, small, scattered groups. Over the past few years though, their numbers have greatly increased, stretching from the mountains of Ursus to the wastelands of Columbia.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our world is not a peaceful one, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: And the wastelands is no exception. You will encounter all sorts of strange people and strange occurrences.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But you will adapt.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Here, Doctor! Dinner's ready!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Thank you, Amiya.

attributes.content: Very good. What a heartfelt scene of intimacy.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mr. Cannot!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ahem... I am simply jesting. My apologies, please do not take it seriously.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: At this rate, you will lose everything.
You will be alone, with nothing. Is it worth it?
Loneliness is a poison that erodes the mind. How much do you think you can withstand?
By the time you awaken, there will be no kin at your side. Nobody will recognize your sacrifice, let alone remember it. Is this the future you look forward to?
You wake up.
A crimson glow spills forth from the distant horizon, and the darkness left unto humanity by the Shadow-Moon gradually ebbs.
Frigid wind gnaws at your cheeks as it blows across your face, and the land of Terra once again ushers in a new dawn.
You are up very early, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: The morning air is refreshing.

attributes.content: Where's the little rabbit? Is she not awake yet?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Let her rest a bit longer. What are you doing?;Maybe the aroma of breakfast will be more effective.

attributes.content: Short-tailed fowlbeasts don't have much meat, but they can suffice as breakfast.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: This is a specialty of the Columbian wastelands. Worry not, it's free of charge.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: A new day comes to Terra, and the situation has not changed, as far as I can tell. Nevertheless, good morning, friend!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You were talking in your sleep last night. Your mental state has seemed a bit unstable, do be careful.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: What did you hear?

attributes.content: I am a trustworthy person. I didn't go out of my way to listen, let alone remember anything. Plus, you were only mumbling. Couldn't really hear anything clearly.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But... Every night, the little rabbit is very concerned about your sleep-talking.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Pardon me for being nosy, but after all the chatting we've done on our journey, it is hard not to take certain impressions. Have you lost your memories, or something of that sort?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I see. If that's some sort of secret, let's say I never asked. It is an uncouth question indeed, and I asked out of simple curiosity.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Some things... happened to me, and I lost some of my memories.
...Maybe most of them.
Occasionally, I will recall some of them... just tiny fragments.
Well, maybe not occasionally. Only a few rare times.

attributes.content: Friend, I have a vague idea of what's going on.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Suppose your memory is a spread-out newspaper, and now, someone has spilled a bucket of paint on it.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You can only see bits and pieces of the content through the gaps in the paint, but you can't grasp the full picture of that content.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: That seems like a pretty good description of my experiences. I am... a stranger to myself.;I can't even say if your analogy is accurate. I... don't know.

attributes.content: It sounds like something that defies all words, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But I am no psychiatrist, and there is not much I can do for you.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Sometimes, I even find myself thinking about the kind of person I was before all this.
I don't know who I am. I can only piece myself together from the words of others.

attributes.content: That's not important, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Our existence is often based on how others perceive us. The sum of your 'self' is but the feedback of auditory, visual, and emotional interaction with others.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what kind of person 'you' are, but from a social point of view, it should be quite clear what kind of person others need you to be.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Do you happen to have anything that can restore memories quickly?;Do you know any tricks that could help me get my memories back as soon as possible?;Do you perhaps know some way of restoring my memory quickly after I make up my mind?

attributes.content: I do, but I can't recommend it. Let me think of how to put this...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Our lives are like an elastic belt. If you stretch out one side, the other side will contract.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: If you want to restore your memories 'quickly,' you will have to endure many unmanageable consequences.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: That quaint head of yours might not withstand such a tussle. Besides, this only applies to the most common forms of 'amnesia.'
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Whether for your own sake, or for that of the little bunny who you value so much, I'd recommend just taking things easy.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: By the way, the little rabbit's up.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Doctor... Good morning.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Morning, Amiya.

attributes.content: I'll leave you two to it then. I'm going to fetch some firewood.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Amiya stands beside you quietly, watching the sun rising in the distance.
The rays of light are slowly melting the cold tones of the wastelands, every piece of the rocky desert dyed by the gradually rising sun.
Perhaps you have never set foot upon this land, but in a corner of Terra's vast domain, you once wandered with Amiya.
You once left your footprints in this sparsely populated world.
This should have been your impression, your fragments of your memory— but the truth is, this is the 'story' Kal'tsit told you.
In the cold wind of the early morning, you rack your brain, trying to find a tangible thread within your hazy memory.
The light of daybreak, the cold wind of the wastelands. You and Amiya, Amiya and you. You can remember, and yet you cannot remember.
Amiya takes hold of your hand.
Doctor, are you okay?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: ...I'm fine.

attributes.content: I remember it was around the same time. We spent our first night in the wastelands, and watched the sun rise over the horizon just like this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You asked me a bunch of weird questions...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Haha... Of course, all of that happened years ago, but it seems like it was just yesterday.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Sorry, Amiya... I...

attributes.content: It's okay, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as you're here, one day, things will get better.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The next day
2:39 P.M. \ Clear
Messenger Outpost
Several huge engineering vehicles and armed off-road transports make a circular formation on the rocky, barren expanses, surrounding several makeshift sheds.
The noisy din of generators and the roar of running Originium boilers can be heard near and far, intermingled with the loud conversations of travelers and Messengers.
The Messenger Outpost, an oasis of civilization beyond the ecological oasis of the wastelands, your destination.
Finally! We've arrived safely at the post!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: We didn't encounter any major difficulties on our journey, nor did a Catastrophe befall us. You are quite lucky indeed, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The third car from the left is the Messenger contact station here. You might be able to contact your group there. The Messenger rates here are pretty good.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But... the room over there has the logo of Mama John's on it. Are you sure it's fine?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As long as you keep a low profile and don't cause any trouble, there won't be any problems. This is a Messenger outpost after all. Even in Columbia, few companies will go out of their way to get on the Messengers' bad side.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Doctor... Wait here for me. I don't stand out as much as you do, so I'll head down to the Messenger contact station.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Mr. Cannot, can I trouble you to stay with the Doctor for a while? I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Don't worry, little rabbit. I am good at hiding people from prying eyes. There won't be any problems.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Relax, friend. Look at those armed vehicles over there. Do you see those anti-armor turrets? Trust me, it's very safe here.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Here, have a sip.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It's a specialty from a local microbrewery. Give it a try.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Is this... beer?

attributes.content: Indeed. I've heard the owner of this microbrewery is an Infected. Unexpected, yes? Even among Columbia's pioneers, there are few who can accomplish this much.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Now is not the time to drink and make merry.

attributes.content: Fair enough. Why don't we go relax over there and listen to the news?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You know, the very best thing about Columbia is that they provide radio base stations for all the wasteland outposts. You can hear the news on the radio from just about anywhere.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Almost all cities have intra-city broadcasting, but the decision to cover the wilderness with base stations is unique in Terra. You should take it all in, and treat it like sightseeing.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: ...The armed conflict that occurred in the Northern District of Tkaronto has gradually subsided. On site, police found evidence of a large-scale crossbow shoot-out, but have not apprehended any suspects...
attributes.name: News Broadcast

attributes.content: ...The Tkaronto Police announced that one of the parties involved in the conflict has ties to a foreign company, 'Rhodes Island.' The specifics of this organization are not known at this time...
attributes.name: News Broadcast

attributes.content: ...Some sources note that this foreign company has certain commercial conflicts with a local firm, but the spokesperson of this local business declined to comment on the matter.
attributes.name: News Broadcast

attributes.content: The police believe that this may have been a terrorist attack on Tkaronto, and the specifics of this armed conflict are pending further investigation.
attributes.name: News Broadcast

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You're back, little rabbit?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The people at the Messenger contact station didn't come to work until three past noon, so we'll have to wait.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The news just now...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It sounds like your people have withdrawn successfully, which is a good thing.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But Mama John's probably got what it came for. Most regrettable.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: We're the victims, but the police are looking for us.;......;The corporate intrigue here reminds me of Kazimierz.

attributes.content: Hah, something like this is a routine operation in Columbia. That bunch moved quickly and wiped their asses in advance.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Don't dwell on it, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You'll leave this place soon enough. It's too late to manage this problem now, but be more mindful about it next time.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: But what do they get out of a batch of semi-finished medicine samples?;Before that, Mr. Know-It-All, can you tell me why they're so desperate?

attributes.content: Very well... It seems that you've made up your mind.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Are you familiar with Columbia's business, my friend? How many times have you had to deal with them in the past?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has had some simple dealings with a few Columbian technology companies.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh, I'm sure 'simple dealings' are decently good on the surface.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But, my friend, the ugly and indecent parts are not often placed on the table for everyone to see.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Come then. I will take you someplace, so you can see something fun.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Next!
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: H-Hello... I need this month's dose.
attributes.name: Infected

attributes.content: Sure, let's take a look...
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: Mr. Dave, is it? Ah yes, I saw your application. You've been a model employee this past month. Here's your monthly medicine ration.
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: Thank you... Thank you...
attributes.name: Infected Dave

attributes.content: Um, would it be possible... to get next month's dose in advance? My wife is in pretty bad shape lately, and I need...
attributes.name: Infected Dave

attributes.content: Mr. Dave, according to company regulations, we are unable to provide any medication in advance. Thank you for your understanding.
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: But as you know, we always prepare additional medicine for commercial sale, and you can always go next door to purchase more Oripathy suppressants.
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: B-But...
attributes.name: Infected Dave

attributes.content: Company regulations, Mr. Dave. Thank you for your understanding.
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: Next!
attributes.name: Corporate Staff

attributes.content: What... what is this place?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Shhhh, hush. This is the Frontier Department of Mama John's. Keep a low profile.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They're passing out medicine to the Infected?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In Columbia, many things operate in a way unlike elsewhere in Terra.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: For example, consider the wasteland pioneers— Pioneers, the lifeblood of Columbia's westward expansion, the writers of Columbia's wilderness stories, the protagonists of the Columbian dream.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They sign a contract with Mama John's and open up land in the barren wastes, establishing residential areas for Columbia and its companies.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Depending on how they work, companies will also provide them with medicine and supplies, as a sort of wage.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Here, take this.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: The solid and liquid components are packaged separately. This is the medicine they distribute?;......;What... What on earth...?

attributes.content: This is the medication that they give to the Infected. You are the expert here, I doubt you need me to explain.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: This is not an Oripathy suppressant.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course not, you know better than me. This half is a generic painkiller and the other half is a nutrient solution.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's not a question of why, don't you see? They don't need to sell real suppressants.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: These pioneers, Infected from all over the world, have never seen a real Oripathy suppressant.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Though these things can't actually suppress Oripathy itself, they can relieve the symptoms of the disease. The product of Mama John's works, and works quickly, and that's good enough for them.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The concept of 'suppressant' is new to Terra, and naturally they wouldn't know.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Since they can make painkillers, they don't need to make real suppressants...
Why do they care about our technology then?

attributes.content: Hahahaha... That story would be even more interesting.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Did you know, before Mama John's became a big name, they were just a donut chain. How could they have mastered the technology to produce drugs?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: All their pharmaceutical production lines are purchased from other companies such as Beachbrella, Towerhill Biotech, Rhine Lab...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Now that they sell painkillers as suppressants and make so much money, do you think the other pharmaceutical companies will sit on their hands?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: They've been thoroughly beaten down by other companies, but they've also learned a whole lot. This time, they've decided to directly off their partner, something that is distinctively Columbian.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: With your batch of samples in hand, I suspect the landscape of their cheap drugs will soon change.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: A more efficacious drug with a stronger analgesic will convince more people that this in fact is an 'Oripathy suppressant.'
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: How can that be allowed?! Rhodes Island's samples are not Oripathy suppressants at all. Those samples haven't been tested for safety yet and might have serious side effects. We haven't...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let me tell you what will happen next.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mama John's will use your technology to make more and more 'suppressants' at lower costs.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course, those poor pioneers will become the guinea pigs.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Will they die? Let me tell you the truth. Even without Mama John's, they will still die—
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: —Columbia's frontiers have been bought with the blood of the pioneers. Their life expectancy is not long regardless.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But those who remain, those whose lives were not claimed while paving the wilderness, are ever more likely to work for them in exchange for these so-called suppressants.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: This medicine gives some short-term pain relief. Maybe it can even buy them a few extra years.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Then, the newspapers across Columbia's major cities will publish headline after headline of their great achievements, right on the front page.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: 'Mama John's Strides Into Pharmaceuticals, Bringing New Hope to the Infected!'
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Impeccable!
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: As for the truth, it is not at all important compared to the actual effectiveness of the analgesics.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course you can tell these poor people, 'those drugs that you're taking can't actually cure Oripathy, but can best be regarded as expensive painkillers and placebos.' And then what?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You keep telling the truth, saying that even the best suppressants by far can't bring back their completely normal lives and that they will continue to be accompanied by sickness and pain until they die.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: On the subject of Oripathy, Rhodes Island indeed stands at the bleeding edge in this world, so you know the truth. But is it a truth that they can stomach?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: And this... is Columbia, my friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Nothing will change, and everything makes sense. People come to Columbia with hope, create value with hope, and die with hope.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But we can't just sit around and watch them use Rhodes Island to...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: See, this is very practical.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You cannot save them, nobody can save them. Not to mention, it is difficult even to protect yourselves now.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: For the Infected who harbor hope in their hearts, hope never existed in the first place, and you know this better than they do.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You should contact your people sooner rather than later, and find a way to get back.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: You're right, Mr. Cannot.;......;I don't want to admit it, but facts are facts.

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I know, that hope is a cruel thing indeed.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: When you realize it can't be undone, when you realize you are powerless, when you find yourself nothing but desperate...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Hope is enough to drive a perfectly good person mad.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: People believe what they want to believe, and that makes them feel much better.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You look over at Amiya. You watch her ears slowly droop, her eyes filled with sadness, then stained with helplessness.
The two of you have seen much, but you both will see more still. You both understand all this, and in fact, there is no need for the wasteland merchant to explain it again.
In the distance, along the border between the wastelands and the sky, the sun slowly sinks.
Day is about to draw to an end in Terra's wastelands. The light is about to fade, and the twin moons will soon take its place in the sky.
The sun will still rise tomorrow, but not every Infected will see the coming dawn.
Even if there are enough drugs to suppress Oripathy in this place, it is too late for so many more. Nothing will change.
Nothing will change?

attributes.options: But— Mr. Cannot.
Even if hope will continue to bring us pain, I still think it's worth it.
If we give up on hope, what is the meaning of everything we've had to endure?

attributes.content: Doctor...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh! Quite the rousing speech, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You did not convince me, for you will find it hard to do so, but I felt the sincerity of your emotions.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I do like how you still refuse to bow to reality despite having seen it, though to be honest, you've already embarrassed yourselves.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Let's put that speech aside for now. I know that you two are very practical people, so I will also pose a very practical question. I'm quite curious, what will you do next?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You've already arrived at the Messenger Outpost at the border, and you will be leaving this place soon.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Do you plan to turn around and head back? What then?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: To be frank, my friend, unless you have some way of getting your things back from them, you will have a very hard time resolving these matters.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Will you charge there single-handedly with all guns blazing? Should I lend you a burdenbeast so you can look like a hero of the vale from the indigenous Columbian peoples' folklore?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Oh, I almost forgot, you can't fight.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Mr. Cannot, please don't say that about the Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: No, Amiya, he's right.

Sometimes, we don't necessarily need to use force.;We can use their own ways to resolve the problem— and I just happen to have some practice.;In order to get Rhodes Island out of here safely, we have to get crafty.

attributes.content: From the sound of things, you plan to appeal to reason?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Four days later
4:01 P.M. \ Clear
Columbia Detention Center
Alright, you can leave now.
attributes.name: Columbian Police

attributes.options: Thank you. Thank you very much.

attributes.content: Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It went well, Amiya.

attributes.content: Don't do that again! I was really... I was worried sick!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You played your bag of tricks quite well, my friend. Very clever.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I'm glad that the little excursion I took you on was not in vain, nor was me waiting out here for a few days. I really did underestimate you.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But, I am a bit scared of you now, my friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: I'll take that as a compliment.;...It's alright.;To be honest, I was a bit scared too when I woke up to a bucket-head.

attributes.content: I... I still don't understand... what happened.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Simply stated... our clever friend here voluntarily surrendered to Columbian Customs and Border Protection, saying that your company had smuggled a batch of Oripathy-related drugs into Columbia.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: If you know anything about Columbian laws, you should know that Oripathy-related drugs are the most strictly-regulated medical products.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The company that lobbied to implement this law in the past spent a lot of efforts to monopolize the drug market in Columbia.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The information provided by our friend here definitely alarmed the Columbian Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Arts Units, and Originium, and they certainly aren't easy to deal with.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Per protocol, the Bureau's security forces went there in no time and seized all items in this smuggled product trade.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But, we have complete contracts and records of our cooperation with them, which should be easy to find...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hahaha, that's the important part.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Miss Rabbit, when they chose to attack you, they had no intention of leaving any footprints. They have destroyed all evidence of this cooperation, and nothing would match up in the investigation.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: So what kind of situation will prevent a company from leaving behind any evidence of a transaction?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: What else but shady business.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: So it was the Columbian government that seizes all the samples...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: According to law, they will destroy these smuggled goods, and then? There's nothing after that. Mama John's is pretty much omnipotent around here, but what if the scope extends to cover all of Columbia?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Columbian Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Arts Units, and Originium. Their name might be a mouthful, but they have some competent people. And they'll be watching closely.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I understand now... But even with that being the case, won't Rhodes Island have a blackened record?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hahaha, this is Columbia after all. There's not a company out there with a perfectly wiped rear.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Pay a fine, sign off on the ticket, and it won't be long until people forget about it— perhaps, people might have stopped caring already.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: After all, in order to cover their ass, Mama John's might have inadvertently given Rhodes Island its best cover— and in case the Bureau really came for Rhodes Island, they would be the ones in trouble.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course, your Doctor did spend three days in the Bureau's detention room, which is its own price.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: It's hard for me to evaluate this move, Doctor...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit is going to be mad.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: That she will be, but if there's anything I know about her...;I'll just tell her I learned it from watching her.

attributes.content: I wouldn't mouth off like that if I were you...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: Oh, Blaze. The gang's all here.

attributes.content: The well-built Feline operator is looking at you with eyes of helplessness.
Doctor, you caused a real big uproar this time around...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Fines, fees, jail time, and even the Columbian government investigating illegitimate business practices...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But I have no clue how you managed to sort it all out. I almost had to call Dr. Kal'tsit myself.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How the hell are you gonna explain all this to her when you get back?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.options: I... have my ways.;......;Uhh, beg for mercy.

attributes.content: Doctor! Please don't ever take a gamble like this in the future. We could contact the ship and wait for support!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Besides, Rhodes Island actually has a contingency plan for dealing with situations like this.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: At least the trip through the wastelands was fun, wasn't it?

attributes.content: Fun? ...I suppose, just a little...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor! Don't change the subject!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: After we get back, you have to tell the whole truth to Dr. Kal'tsit. I'll help you with the report.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Okay...;Thanks...

attributes.content: Then I suppose it is time to part ways, my friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: As I said before, our journey together was most enjoyable.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Yes, it definitely was. Thank you so much, Mr. Cannot.;Thanks for everything. We may meet again someday.

attributes.content: I do believe we will meet again in the near future.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Until then, I wish you good health. See you later.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Who was that? Gave me the sense there was something else under that nice front of his...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Hmm?

attributes.content: There's something I'd like to ask you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Back then, you said you needed Mr. Cannot to do a little favor for you. What was it?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Three days ago
3:27 P.M. \ Clear
Somewhere in the wastelands
You're a real crazy one, friend.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: That's a rather destructive trick you've got there.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: So, what do you need my help with?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Though we don't want to use force, I still want to keep the option open.

I would like your people to protect Amiya, up until she leaves safely.;Maybe your people can ensure that Rhodes Island doesn't come under attack.;In case of emergency, I'd like your people to do some clean-up work for me.

attributes.content: Oi! Hold up, easy now.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: What do you mean by 'my people?'
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: Mr. Cannot, I hope you can at least be honest with me now.;We've been followed the whole way, right?;We might just be lucky, as you said. But is it really just luck?

attributes.content: The strange man has gone silent, but you can't judge his expression under the thick bucket helm. However, you feel that the silence harbors neither anger nor dissatisfaction.
Well done, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: I thought my friends did a good job concealing themselves. This whole time, I took you for an intelligent but overly sentimental person.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You truly are full of surprises.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Well then, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Of course I can help you with this little favor, though I believe that with Miss Amiya's skills, she won't really need my help.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: But business is business, and what can you offer me?
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: I'll turn a blind eye to the documents you took from our car.
How does that sound to you?

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Beautifully played, friend. It's a deal.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.options: If everything goes well, we will see you in three days.

attributes.content: Of course, my friend. I wish you the best of luck.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: All right, you can come out now.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: You alone? Is it over?
attributes.name: Fiends Gang Member

attributes.content: Not quite. The upcoming show should be quite entertaining.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: That one's extremely dangerous. We shouldn't let 'em go.
attributes.name: Fiends Gang Member

attributes.content: We could come up against that Rhodes Island. Why should we help them?
attributes.name: Rusthammer Member

attributes.content: Just trust me. The existence of an organization like theirs is good for us.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: The longer such people live, the more interesting this world will become.
attributes.name: Cannot

attributes.content: Let's go, friends. We still have a lot of work to do.
attributes.name: Cannot
